mapper.select: SELECT CODE, NAME, TYPE FROM FUND
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUND ( CODE, NAME, TYPE, TYPE1, COMPANY_NAME, SUBJECT_NAME, FUND_SCALE, ESTABLISH_DATE, CXPJ, YHPJ, HTPJ, JAJXPJ, ZSPJ, UPDATERID, UPDATETIME ) VALUES ( #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{establishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP }, #{cxpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yhpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{htpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jajxpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zspj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 'admin', NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE FUND SET NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE1 = #{type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_NAME = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT_NAME = #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUND_SCALE = #{fundScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ESTABLISH_DATE = #{establishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP }, CXPJ = #{cxpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YHPJ = #{yhpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HTPJ = #{htpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JAJXPJ = #{jajxpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZSPJ = #{zspj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATERID = 'admin', UPDATETIME = NOW() where CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT INTO FUND ( CODE, NAME, TYPE, TYPE1, COMPANY_NAME, SUBJECT_NAME, FUND_SCALE, ESTABLISH_DATE, CXPJ, YHPJ, HTPJ, JAJXPJ, ZSPJ, UPDATERID, UPDATETIME ) VALUES
( #{fund.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fund.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fund.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fund.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fund.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fund.subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fund.fundScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fund.establishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP }, #{fund.cxpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fund.yhpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fund.htpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fund.jajxpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fund.zspj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, 'admin', NOW() )

update.foreach: UPDATE FUND SET NAME = #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{item.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE1 = #{item.type1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_NAME = #{item.companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT_NAME = #{item.subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FUND_SCALE = #{item.fundScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ESTABLISH_DATE = #{item.establishDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP }, CXPJ = #{item.cxpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YHPJ = #{item.yhpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HTPJ = #{item.htpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JAJXPJ = #{item.jajxpj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZSPJ = #{item.zspj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UPDATERID = 'admin', UPDATETIME = NOW() where CODE = #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
